overview: The swinging curtains look like long hair. A strange face hides underneath. The hands slowly open the hair curtain. The face is the main stage and the show is scheduled for today. But now he sleeps. With the help of the hands, the face is ready to perform. It is not in the best condition, so the hands have to do some manipulations to make it look more performing. Something is going wrong. The language wants to ruin the performance, the hands have to start their work from the beginning. But the language was not the only disturbance. The face is acting strangely. Eventually, the hands get nervous and tear the face apart.
title: THY FACE
